front.title: IEEE Standard for Salient-Pole 50 Hz and 60 Hz Synchronous Generators and Generator/Motors for Hydraulic Turbine Applications Rated 5 MVA and Above
front.abstract: The requirements in this standard apply to all types of 50 Hz and 60 Hz salient-pole synchronous generators and generator/motors rated 5 MVA and above to be used for hydraulic turbine or hydraulic pump/turbine applications.
